name: LabelMapToBinaryImageFilter

members.name: BackgroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the value used as "background" in the output image. Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::NonpositiveMin() .
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the value used as "background" in the output image. Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::NonpositiveMin() .

members.name: ForegroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the value used as "foreground" in the output image. Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::max() .
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the value used as "foreground" in the output image. Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::max() .

briefdescription: Convert a LabelMap to a binary image.
detaileddescription:
LabelMapToBinaryImageFilter to a binary image. All the objects in the image are used as foreground. The background values of the original binary image can be restored by passing this image to the filter with the SetBackgroundImage() method.

This implementation was taken from the Insight Journal paper: https://www.insight-journal.org/browse/publication/176 

\author Gaetan Lehmann. Biologie du Developpement et de la Reproduction, INRA de Jouy-en-Josas, France.


\see LabelMapToLabelImageFilter , LabelMapMaskImageFilter
